1:
Praise Yahweh.\q Praise the name of Yahweh.
\q Praise him, you servants of Yahweh,
\q
2:
you who stand in Yahweh's house,\q in the courtyards of the house of our God.


\q
3:
Praise Yahweh, for he is good;\q sing praises to his name, for it is pleasant to do so.
\q
4:
For Yahweh has chosen Jacob for himself,\q Israel as his possession.


\q
5:
I know that Yahweh is great,\q that our Lord is above all gods.
\q
6:
Whatever Yahweh desires, he does\q in heaven, on earth, in the seas and all the ocean depths.


\q
7:
He brings the clouds from far away,\q making lightning bolts accompany the rain
\q and bringing the wind out of his storehouse.


\q
8:
He killed the firstborn of Egypt,\q both of man and animals.
\q
9:
He sent signs and wonders into your midst, Egypt,\q against Pharaoh and all his servants.


\q
10:
He attacked many nations\q and killed mighty kings,
\q
11:
Sihon king of the Amorites\q and Og king of Bashan
\q and all the kingdoms of Canaan.


\q
12:
He gave us their land as an inheritance,\q an inheritance to Israel his people.
\q
13:
Your name, Yahweh, endures forever;\q your renown, Yahweh, endures throughout all generations.
\q
14:
For Yahweh defends his people\q and has compassion on his servants.


\q
15:
The nations' idols are silver and gold,\q the work of men's hands.
\q
16:
Those idols have mouths, but they do not speak;\q they have eyes, but they do not see;
\q
17:
they have ears, but they do not hear,\q nor is there breath in their mouths.
\q
18:
Those who make them are like them,\q as is everyone who trusts in them.


\q
19:
Descendants of Israel, bless Yahweh;\q descendants of Aaron, bless Yahweh.
\q
20:
Descendants of Levi, bless Yahweh;\q you who honor Yahweh, bless Yahweh.
\q
21:
Blessed be Yahweh in Zion,\q he who lives in Jerusalem.
\q Praise Yahweh.
